601700.name: JETBROS
601700.description:
JETBROS, is a Jetpack-Action-Shooter-Game inspired by platform shooters of the 80s.

Fight your way through treacherous caves and bunker systems.
Fly over dangerous lava pits.
Destroy everything in your way!
Liberate weapons from their crates!
Ammunition doesn't exist!

Easy to learn but hard to master !!!

Already Implemented


  • 3 Level (extremely long)
  • Local COOP mode
  • Controller support
  • Free configurable control
  • 8 weapons
  • 11 Standard opponents
  • 6 Bosses
  • Unlockable arcade center
  • 1 Usable vehicle
  • Level stopwatch (for Speedrunners)
  • Savepoints (So the long levels are not going to be too long. ;) )

Planned Content


  • Another 4 huge levels
  • Another 8 bosses
  • More big guns
  • ☑ Usable vehicles
  • more Usable vehicles
  • Each level new enemys
  • ☑ Unlockable content
  • more Unlockable content
  • ☑ Hardcore mode
  • Bugs! Many bugs!
  • Bugfixes! Many bugfixes!
